title: The presidential Inauguration invitation for Ronald Reagan in 1981. Does anyone know the name of this particular script?
author: mirandy

comments.content:
Done by hand by a calligrapher, not a font.  
Perhaps someone else could point you to typefaces in the same style.

EDIT  
I see now that it was already answered: [http://typophile.com/node/123415](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424040313/http:/typophile.com/node/123415 "http://typophile.com/node/123415")
Thank you for your help, as well. I do appreciate all the help I can get.
